In England, in the seven days to 18 July, there were 303,974 new confirmed cases (540.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 July, there were 203,186 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 50% (100,788 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 July is 4,918,669 (8,738.6 cases per 100,000 population).
